summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3923 for the improvement of East 52nd Street, from University Way to 15th Avenue Northeast; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No.47776 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
